This is NOT the defeat of Fast-Track, yet...They are bringing TAA up for a re-vote on Monday or Tuesday, and if that passes, the whole thing goes through as planned. So it's very important that everyone keep calling/emailing their reps in the House and tell them to vote NO on TAA.

That's just one thing I don't get about men. Woman who are positive don't mind gathering and giving to each other outside of the bullish! It doesn't make you that woman but it allows for you to start a platform for better. So, maybe I'm lost because your looking at this as, the physical not mental aspects. It's not about dictating another person life, but showing your life as a example to help build up all Men. I'm not even a Steve Harvey fan like, but I respect his journey. As far as what his wife did, what was it that she did? There have been plenty of God & Bad role models in my life whom aren't famous and they pass on tools it's up to the person receiving the tools to use and apply them to there life and self. I'm not here to convince you as a man to want to be better. However, there nothing wrong with someone wanting breakdown barriers and walls for others. Also, counseling is good for everyone single and married! As, for this group of Marjory all men my point still stands the same, and guess what Steve Harvey wasn't even my influence on my opinions it was my personal growth, my up bringing and environment and my willingness to want to be a better woman. You can't do that on your own if you don't know how. FYI What does Slavery have to do with this conversation?
